text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Did you all watch the daily Dumpo show? Its really a faux rally for him, (he admitted as much), because he can't get out. So he "uses" people's deaths, and fear of the Covid19, to lash out, carry on, stomp his little feet and "dare" the doctors to go against his nonsense. 1/2
